review: Pros: good app offering, fast software response (menus and the like feel snappy), it's cheap.Cons: Drops the network, stutters (even with streaming content across your local network (plex)), some problems require a restart (this process involves getting behind your tv and unplugging the power connection to your fire tv stick, there is no "restart" menu option).I've spent a lot of time trying to troubleshoot my network, which performs very well with everything else, including devices much farther away, and behind many more obstructions. I'm now going to attempt a troubleshooting step that i found online, which is to put it in the hdmi extension provided (around 2 inch extension). If this does solve my problem, i'll provide an update, but this is not something that a device like this should have as a requirement to work.
